summary.span: 显示一个月的日历，用户能够用它选择日期并移到下一个月或上个月。

span.span: Displays a single-month calendar that enables the user to select dates and move to the next or previous month.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#Accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用控件在网页上显示单个月份的日历。Use the control to display a single month of a calendar on a Web page. 控件可以选择日期并移到下一步或上一个月份。The control allows you to select dates and move to the next or previous month. 控件支持所有中的类型命名空间。The control supports all the types in the namespace. 除了公历，这还包括不同年份和月份系统，例如 Hjiri 日历使用的日历。Apart from the Gregorian calendar, this also includes calendars that use different year and month systems, such as the Hjiri calendar. 你可以指定是否控件允许你通过设置中选择一天、 周或整月属性。You can specify whether the control allows you to select a single day, week, or entire month by setting the property. 默认情况下，该控件显示月份中的天标头的星期日期，使用月份名称和年、 用于选择各个月中的日期，链接和将移动到下一步和上一个月的链接的标题。By default, the control displays the days of the month, day headings for the days of the week, a title with the month name and year, links for selecting individual days of the month, and links for moving to the next and previous month. 你可以自定义的外观通过设置用于控制控件的不同部分的样式的属性的控件。You can customize the appearance of the control by setting the properties that control the style for different parts of the control. 下表列出了指定的不同部分的控件的样式的属性。The following table lists the properties that specify the style for the different parts of the control. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定显示一周中的各天的部分的样式。Specifies the style for the section that displays the days of the week.| ||指定在显示的月份日期的样式。Specifies the style for the dates in the displayed month.| ||在标题部分中指定的导航控件的样式。Specifies the style for the navigation controls in the title section.| ||指定不在当前显示的月份日期的样式。Specifies the style for the dates that are not in the currently displayed month.| ||在选定日期的日历上指定的样式。Specifies the style for the selected dates on the calendar.| ||指定周和月份日期选择列的样式。Specifies the style for the week and month date-selection column.| ||指定的标题区域的样式。Specifies the style for the title section.| ||指定为今天的日期的样式。Specifies the style for today's date.| ||指定周末日期的样式。Specifies the style for the weekend dates.| 你还可以显示或隐藏的控件的不同部分。You can also show or hide different parts of the control. 下表列出用于控制哪些部分是显示还是隐藏的属性。The following table lists the properties that control which parts are shown or hidden. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||显示或隐藏显示一周中的各天的部分。Shows or hides the section that displays the days of the week.| ||显示或隐藏月份中的天之间的网格线。Shows or hides the gridlines between the days of the month.| ||显示或隐藏的下一步或上一个月份的导航控件。Shows or hides the navigation controls to the next or previous month.| ||显示或隐藏标题部分。Shows or hides the title section.| 尽管绑定到数据源不支持控件，你可以修改的内容和格式的各个日期单元格。Although binding to a data source is not supported for the control, you can modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前控件显示在网页上，它会创建并汇编构成控件的组件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 引发事件时的每一天中的单元格创建控件。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 可以控制内容，因为它的日期单元格的格式提供事件处理程序中的代码是否创建事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell as it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 有关自定义日期单元格的内容的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see . > [!NOTE] > 控件呈现给客户端浏览器 ECMAScript （JScript、 JavaScript）。The control renders ECMAScript (JScript, JavaScript) to the client browser. 客户端浏览器必须具有 ECMAScript 对于此控件启用才能正常工作。The client browser must have ECMAScript enabled for this control to function properly. 有关客户端脚本的详细信息，请参阅[客户端脚本中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa)。For more information on client script, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13edb6b9-2dea-43c6-b8c1-a47207de19aa). ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards. 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建在网页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Calendar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Calendar Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示编辑一个显示的列时使用的控件控件。The following example shows a control used when editing one of the columns displayed by a control. 控件绑定到数据源`Bind`方法。The control is bound to the data source with the `Bind` method. `Eval`方法用于将日期值显示绑定控件。The `Eval` method is used to bind the date value that is displayed by the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[GridViewConcepts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewConcepts/CS/gridviewcustomcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[GridViewConcepts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/GridViewConcepts/VB/gridviewcustomvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表标题用于描述一到三个句子中的表的性质。A table caption is used to describe the nature of the table in one to three sentences. 使用属性使用日历标题的对齐。Use the property to align the caption with the calendar. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性显示的标题控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a caption for a control. summary.span: 获取或设置呈现为日历标题的文本的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the text that is rendered as a caption for the calendar.

value.span: 一个 值，指示标题的对齐方式。

span.span: A value that indicates the alignment of the caption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性确定标题相对于出现的位置控件。This property determines where the caption appears in relation to the control. 默认值是，它可让浏览器确定要将对齐标题位置。The default value is , which lets the browser determine where to align the caption. 下表说明之间的关系值和标题的外观。The following table explains the relationship between the value and the appearance of the caption. | 值 value|外观Appearance| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| |`Bottom`|文本居中情况下，该日历，底部将显示标题。The caption appears at the bottom of the calendar, with the text centered.| |`Left`|标题显示在日历上，使用左对齐的文本的顶部。The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text left-aligned.| |`NotSet`|标题对齐未设置，并由浏览器。The caption alignment is not set and is determined by the browser.| |`Right`|标题显示在日历上，使用右对齐的文本的顶部。The caption appears at the top of the calendar, with the text right-aligned.| |`Top`|标题文本居中显示在日历的顶部。The caption appears at the top of the calendar with the text centered.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性对齐的标题控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to align a caption for a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来控制单元格的内容和单元格的边框之间的间距。Use this property to control the spacing between the contents of a cell and the cell's border. 指定的填充量添加到单元格的所有四个边。The padding amount specified is added to all four sides of a cell. 不能指定单个单元格的大小。Individual cell sizes cannot be specified. > [!NOTE] > 此属性设置为`-1`指示呈现的表中未设置此属性。Setting this property to `-1` indicates that this property is not set in the rendered table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性填充具有 5 个像素的每个单元格。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to pad each cell with 5 pixels. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性指定的名称格式为每周天数。Use the property to specify the name format for the days of the week. 此属性设置的其中一条枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 你可以指定是否每周天数显示为完整的名称，短 （缩写） 的名称、 一天中的第一个字母或一天中的前两个字母。You can specify whether the days of the week are displayed as the full name, short (abbreviated) name, first letter of the day, or first two letters of the day. 此属性仅适用于属性设置为`true`。This property applies only if the property is set to `true`. 星期几名称基于服务器的本地设置。The day names are based on the server's local settings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定完全显示的每周天数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that days of the week are displayed in full. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每一天创建控件层次结构中时引发此事件控件。This event is raised when each day is created in the control hierarchy for the control. 尽管不支持数据绑定控件，它是可以修改内容以及各个日期单元格的格式设置。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前控件显示在网页上，它会创建并汇编构成控件的组件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 引发事件时的每一天中的单元格创建控件。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 你可以控制的内容和提供的事件处理程序中的代码创建时的日期单元格格式事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 有关自定义日期单元格的内容的详细信息，请参阅。For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see . > [!NOTE] > 因为引发事件时时呈现控件，所以无法添加的控件，也可以引发事件，例如。Because the event is raised while the control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as . 你仅可以添加静态控件，例如， ， ，和。You can only add static controls, such as , , , and . 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件以使的背景色的中显示的月份日期为黄色。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它还演示了如何通过添加自定义单元格的内容到单元格的控件。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管不支持数据绑定控件，它是可以修改内容以及各个日期单元格的格式设置。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前控件显示在网页上，它会创建并汇编构成控件的组件。Before the control is displayed on the Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 引发事件时的每一天中的单元格创建控件。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 你可以控制的内容和提供的事件处理程序中的代码创建时的日期单元格格式事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 事件处理程序接收包含事件数据的对象。The event handler receives a object that contains event data. 对象包含可用于以编程方式控制日期单元格的格式的两个属性。The object contains two properties that you can use to programmatically control the format of the date cell. 属性表示单元格呈现，而属性表示要呈现的单元格中的日期。The property represents the cell being rendered, while the property represents the date to render in the cell. 您还可以通过动态添加到的控件定义单元格的内容集合属性。You can also customize the contents of a cell by dynamically adding controls to the collection of the property. > [!NOTE] > 因为引发事件时时呈现控件，所以无法添加的控件，也可以引发事件，例如。Because the event is raised while the control is being rendered, you cannot add a control that can also raise an event, such as . 你仅可以添加静态控件，例如， ， ，和。You can only add static controls, such as , , , and . 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定和代码的处理程序事件以使的背景色的中显示的月份日期为黄色。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它还演示了如何通过添加自定义单元格的内容到单元格的控件。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来提供自定义文本的上一个月份导航控件。Use the property to provide custom text for the previous month navigation control. 此属性连同常用要提供一组自定义导航控件的属性。This property is commonly used along with the property to provide a custom set of navigation controls. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不会自动编码为 HTML。This property does not automatically encode to HTML. 你需要将特殊字符转换为适当的 HTML 值，除非你想要被视为 HTML 的字符。You need to convert special characters to the appropriate HTML value, unless you want the characters to be treated as HTML. 例如，若要显式显示大于号 (>)，你必须使用值`>`。For example, to explicitly display the greater than symbol (>), you must use the value `>`. 此属性不会自动编码为 HTML，因为它是可以指定用于的 HTML 标记属性。Because this property does not automatically encode to HTML, it is possible to specify an HTML tag for the property. 例如，如果你想要显示下一个月导航控件的映像，你可以将此属性设置为包含的表达式``元素。For example, if you want to display an image for the next month navigation control, you can set this property to an expression that contains an `` element. 此属性仅适用于属性设置为`true`。This property applies only if the property is set to `true`. 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来指定自定义的上一个月份导航控件的文本。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify custom text for the previous month navigation control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定所选的日期上控件。Use the property to determine the selected date on the control. 属性和集合密切相关。The property and the collection are closely related. 当属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，一种模式，允许仅选择一个日期，和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等于 1。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1. 当属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，允许多个的日期选择的模式和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value. 属性使用设置对象。The property is set using a object. 当用户选择日期上控件，引发事件。When the user selects a date on the control, the event is raised. 属性更新为所选日期。The property is updated to the selected date. 集合也会更新以包含只是此日期。The collection is also updated to contain just this date. > [!NOTE] > 这两个属性和集合均被更新之前引发事件。Both the property and the collection are updated before the event is raised. 你可以通过使用替代日期选择事件处理程序来手动设置属性。You can override the date selection by using the event handler to manually set the property. 时以编程方式设置此属性，不会不获取引发事件。The event does not get raised when this property is programmatically set. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定所选的日期上控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the selected date on the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用集合以确定当前所选的日期上控件。Use the collection to determine the currently selected dates on the control. 属性和集合密切相关。The property and the collection are closely related. 当属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.Day`，一种模式，允许仅选择一个日期，和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值和`SelectedDates.Count`等于 1。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.Day`, a mode that allows only a single date selection, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value and `SelectedDates.Count` equals 1. 当属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，允许多个的日期选择的模式和`SelectedDates[0]`具有相同的值。When the property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, modes that allows multiple date selections, and `SelectedDates[0]` have the same value. 属性存储的集合对象。The property stores a collection of objects. 当用户选择一周或每月上控件，引发事件。When the user selects a week or month on the control, the event is raised. 所选的日期添加到集合，替换以前的内容。The selected dates are added to the collection, replacing the previous contents. 以升序按日期排序的日期范围。The range of dates are sorted in ascending order by date. 属性也会更新以包含中的第一个日期集合。The property is also updated to contain the first date in the collection. 你还可以使用集合以编程方式选择上的日期控件。You can also use the collection to programmatically select dates on the control. 使用， ， ，和方法以编程方式操作中的选定的日期集合。Use the , , , and methods to programmatically manipulate the selected dates in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 这两个属性和集合均被更新之前引发事件。Both the property and the collection are updated before the event is raised. 你可以通过使用替代日期选择事件处理程序来手动设置集合。You can override the date selection by using the event handler to manually set the collection. 时以编程方式设置此集合，将不会引发事件。The event is not raised when this collection is programmatically set. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合以确定上的选定的日期控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to determine the selected dates on the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Calendar.SelectedDates Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.SelectedDates Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Calendar.SelectedDates Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.SelectedDates Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性上指定的日期选择模式控件。Use the property to specify the date selection mode on the control. 此属性设置的其中一条枚举值。This property is set with one of the enumeration values. 你可以指定用户可以选择一天、 周或整月，还是可以完全禁用日期选择功能。You can specify whether the user can select a single day, a week, or an entire month, or you can disable date-selection capability entirely. 当此属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek`或`CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`，包含周和月份选择控件的其他选择器列中的第一列显示控件。When this property is set to `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeek` or `CalendarSelectionMode.DayWeekMonth`, an additional selector column that contains week and month selection controls is displayed in the first column of the control. 使用属性可自定义此列的外观。Use the property to customize the appearance of this column. 若要禁用日期选择，请将此属性设置为`CalendarSelectionMode.None`。To disable date selection, set this property to `CalendarSelectionMode.None`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，以允许通过一天、 周或整月的日期选择。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to allow date selection by a single day, a week, or an entire month.
